last_episode_to_air.name: This Is an End
last_episode_to_air.overview: A fast-approaching asteroid headed toward Ahhh! Valley leads the residents to make hasty moving plans, but Grug insists he can defend their homeland.

name: Dawn of the Croods
overview: The world's first family is back for more laughs as they discover sports, sleepovers and other wonders in a world of exotic creatures and adventures. This 2D animated cartoon is based on the 3D animated feature film, "The Croods".

episodes.name: A Gran Day Out
episodes.overview: When Gran moves into the cave with the Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

episodes.name: School of Hard Rocks
episodes.overview: Eep loves to compete, so she teams up with her new friend Lerk and plans to win a school hunting exam, no matter what she has to do.

episodes.name: Wet Hot Ahhh! Valley Summer
episodes.overview: A dare contest makes Eep and Thunk do something crazy at the Watering Hole, and Ugga must overcome her fear of water to save them.

episodes.name: Grug vs. the Moon
episodes.overview: Grug starts a fight with the moon.

episodes.name: This Means Warts
episodes.overview: After snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, the Croods start the first prank war ever.

episodes.name: The First Picture Show
episodes.overview: Everyone loves it when Thunk uses shadow puppets to make the world's first movie ... until they see the end of the show.

episodes.name: Caved & Confused
episodes.overview: When Grug and Ugga go out on a date and leave the kids home alone, Eep throws the first-ever house party, which gets out of control.

episodes.name: The Eep-Over
episodes.overview: Eep invites her friends over for the first sleepover in history.

episodes.name: Thunkytown
episodes.overview: Thunk saves the day when wacky beasts invade.

episodes.name: Mom Genes
episodes.overview: Grug takes Ugga out to practice her hunting skills, but there are some kinds of animals that she just can't seem to catch.

episodes.name: Garden of Eaten
episodes.overview: When Eep becomes a veg-a-eat-ian, the family hunts for the biggest veggies they can find -- until something makes them go back to eating meat.

episodes.name: Night of the Living Croods
episodes.overview: Grug is called a zombie after taking the world's first nap.

episodes.name: A Spoonful of Soo-gar
episodes.overview: After the Croods taste a new food for the first time, they can't stop eating it.

episodes.name: Friday Night Liyotes
episodes.overview: Grug won't let Eep join his winning team, so she forms her own group to play in history's first sports event.

episodes.name: The Crood Who Knew Too Much
episodes.overview: An animal bite has a freaky effect on Grug.

episodes.name: Scent of a Thunk
episodes.overview: Because he is so stinky, Thunk pretends to be something that he really isn't.

episodes.name: Unsolved MysterEep
episodes.overview: When two things go missing in the middle of the night, Eep hunts for clues to solve the first mystery ever.

episodes.name: Gran the Unfriendly Ghost
episodes.overview: During a solar eclipse, Gran fakes her own death to teach her family a lesson.

episodes.name: Bad Sandy
episodes.overview: The Croods must tame Sandy's wild behavior or she'll get exiled.

episodes.name: It Crushes
episodes.overview: When Eep goes gaga over a new boy at school, the Croods try to cure her.

episodes.name: Rebel Without a Paws
episodes.overview: Thunk falls in with the wrong crowd, to his family's dismay.

episodes.name: Grug vs. Math
episodes.overview: Grug struggles to learn a hunting skill that requires brains rather than brawn.

episodes.name: Footloss
episodes.overview: When the adults ban dancing, the teens rebel with an underground club.

episodes.name: The Good Surprise
episodes.overview: To cure their mom's bad mood, Thunk and Eep learn how to surprise her in a good way.

episodes.name: Night Mare on Eep Street
episodes.overview: Eep hunts for an elusive night mare but finds the night crazies.

episodes.name: What Screams May Come
episodes.overview: Eep makes the scream-leading team and falls under her coach's influence.

guest_stars.character: Womp / Dainty / Loo / Bow Chicka Wow Wow (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dan Milano

episodes.name: Grunt Anything
episodes.overview: After neighbor Snoot's wife kicks him out, the Croods help him win her back.

episodes.name: There Will Be Eggs
episodes.overview: Eep and Thunk stumble upon a treasure trove of eggs and become rich -- and mistrustful of each other.

episodes.name: I Think Were Alone Meow
episodes.overview: Gran finds new friends just as crabby as she is.

episodes.name: FrEepy Friday
episodes.overview: After getting grounded (literally) for making mischief with her friends, Eep bets her father that he can't survive even one day as a teenager.

episodes.name: Grug vs. Gurg
episodes.overview: To get a break from his honey-do list, Grug has his doppelgnger fill in for him.

episodes.name: Unfair Fair
episodes.overview: Eep and Thunk try to sabotage a pair of cheaters' idea fair project.

episodes.name: Baby Face Off
episodes.overview: While Thunk baby-sits, Sandy gets blamed for trouble caused by a tiny new neighbor.

episodes.name: The Pursuit of Wrinkliness
episodes.overview: Worried Thunk is too soft to survive, Gran vows to toughen him up.

episodes.name: Croodtopia
episodes.overview: The valley's kids seize a chance to create a no-rules society.

episodes.name: Hands on a Hard Egg
episodes.overview: With a huge egg at stake, a contest is held to see who can hold onto it the longest.

episodes.name: Disaster of Puppets
episodes.overview: After inventing ventriloquism, Thunk gets jealous when his puppet upstages him.

episodes.name: Love Will Eep Us Together
episodes.overview: Banned from dating, Eep sets out to unite two buffalippos instead.

episodes.name: The Tide Is Nigh
episodes.overview: Eep becomes a death-guard at the watering hole, which proves less exciting than she thought.

episodes.name: Rain Gran
episodes.overview: Gran convinces everyone she can control the weather.

episodes.name: Dawn of the Broods
episodes.overview: On vacation, the Croods find a family living alone in a utopia too good to be true. The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

episodes.name: It Takes Ahhh! Valley
episodes.overview: After finding their way out of a creature's stomach, the Croods head back to Ahhh! Valley to stop the Broods from taking over their homeland.

episodes.name: Deus Ex Monkhuahua
episodes.overview: While Grug has his first day as leader of Ahhh! Valley, a new family pet makes Sandy jealous.

episodes.name: Slak Attack
episodes.overview: Eep and Thunk try out a new lazy lifestyle.

episodes.name: Gorgey Girl
episodes.overview: Eep finds a mysterious pen pal to share her feelings with.

episodes.name: A Gran Adventure
episodes.overview: When Gran reveals she's hidden a treasure guarded by booby traps, Eep sets off to find it.

episodes.name: 127 Owwws
episodes.overview: While giving a lesson on self-reliance, Grug suffers a mishap that tests his will to survive.

episodes.name: 28 Fleas Later
episodes.overview: A plan to get revenge against the Broods backfires.

episodes.name: To Squawk with Love
episodes.overview: Squawk's students try to add some fun to his dreary life.

episodes.name: Lerk Was the Night
episodes.overview: When the Broods steal the valley's food supply, it's up to Eep and Lerk to get it back.

guest_stars.character: Bow Chicka Wow Wow / Talking Hole / Sulk (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dominic Catrambone

episodes.name: The Flawed Couple
episodes.overview: To help get all the valley's work done, Grug pairs up every adult with a child trainee.

guest_stars.character: Bulk / Giant Worm / Old Man Root (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: Go-Sip Girl
episodes.overview: Ugga joins the "nitting" club, but has trouble fitting in.

episodes.name: Munk History
episodes.overview: When Munk reports his family missing, Grug takes it upon himself as valley leader to find them.

episodes.name: Happy Howl Day
episodes.overview: The residents of Ahhh! Valley celebrate Howl Day.

episodes.name: Snooty and the Beasts
episodes.overview: When the Big Chickuna invades the valley, all the residents evacuate to safety except for Bulk, whose rescue becomes a contest between Grug and Snoot.

guest_stars.character: Big Chickuna / Bulk / Old Man Root / Tyrannaconda (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

guest_stars.character: Bow Chicka Wow Wow / Fan / Kevin / Sulk (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dominic Catrambone

episodes.name: Zero Dark Thunky
episodes.overview: While he and Eep are held captive by the Broods for a ransom, Thunk finds his soulmate.

episodes.name: Pie vs. Pie
episodes.overview: Ugga's popular meatzza business attracts a competitor: Amber.

episodes.name: Super Smash Siblings
episodes.overview: Eep realizes softy Thunk is the perfect partner for winning a cutthroat game.

episodes.name: A Hole in Grug
episodes.overview: Grug invents a sport he hopes will earn him a spot on the Wall of Fame.

episodes.name: Bait with Destiny
episodes.overview: Thunk demonstrates an unexpected talent that lands him a new job.

episodes.name: Sappy Together
episodes.overview: A sticky situation forces Grug to accept Gran as his hunting partner.

episodes.name: Scare Tactics
episodes.overview: Grug uses fear to get the residents to accept defense measures against the Broods.

episodes.name: DisturbiAHHH!
episodes.overview: While laid up with an injury, Eep witnesses a suspicious encounter.

episodes.name: Thunk O'Clock High
episodes.overview: A new liyote in the neighborhood targets Thunk for bullying.

episodes.name: The Croo-gitive
episodes.overview: When Grug is imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, he must escape to clear his name.

episodes.name: A Few Good Grugs
episodes.overview: Accused of stealing the valley's food stash, the Croods are allowed a "try-all" to prove their innocence.

episodes.name: A Valley Shine Day
episodes.overview: Kevin gives Thunk tips on attracting girls.

episodes.name: Chalk the Line
episodes.overview: Eep tricks her parents into letting her go to a grown-up party.

guest_stars.character: Bow Chicka Wow Wow / Fan / Sulk (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dominic Catrambone

episodes.name: Weighting Is the Hardest Part
episodes.overview: To win back the title of Hefty Hunter, Grug seeks the help of a personal trainer.

episodes.name: Wrestlebabia: The Musical
episodes.overview: Sandy expresses her frustrations about being treated like a baby by breaking into song.

guest_stars.character: Earl / Thunderhooves / Yelp / Baby Animals / Mosquitoad (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: Flowers for Munk
episodes.overview: Grug helps Munk get his job back with an IQ-boosting worm.

episodes.name: They Might Be Sky Giants
episodes.overview: While unconscious, Eep has a life-changing vision.

episodes.name: The Grugest Story Ever Told
episodes.overview: Afraid he's no longer respected as valley leader, Grug enlists Thunk to perform his life story.

episodes.name: Worms of Endearment
episodes.overview: Lerk's plan to save her worm playmates from becoming bait spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Dr. StrangeGrug or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Spear
episodes.overview: Grug introduces his new invention to Ahhh! Valley: the spear.

episodes.name: Tunnel of Terror
episodes.overview: Eep drags her friends into Ahhh! Valley's Tunnel of Terror to see if it lives up to its name.

episodes.name: Creature from the Crood Lagoon
episodes.overview: A mysterious creature saves Thunk from drowning.

episodes.name: Voice Fail
episodes.overview: When Grug loses his commanding voice, he and Ugga search for it. Meanwhile, Eep gets carried away while acting as the valley leader's spokesperson.

episodes.name: Punch-Thunk Love
episodes.overview: After finding out Thunk is in love with Blurg Brood, Eep tries to interest him in a new girl.

episodes.name: Nay Boors
episodes.overview: Ugga attempts to drive away selfish neighbor Snoot.

episodes.name: Caverns and Creepers
episodes.overview: Eep's love of competition and destruction ruins Thunk's teamwork-based game.

episodes.name: Rad Teacher
episodes.overview: Squawk gets fired and is replaced by a very different kind of teacher.

guest_stars.character: Liyotes / Squawk / Screamweeds / Bear Owl / Mosquitoad (voices)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: Grug's First Chance
episodes.overview: Grug stumbles on an easy way to solve feuds as valley leader.

episodes.name: Furry Road
episodes.overview: Thunk narrates a documentary on one of Ahhh! Valley's many creatures: the bearowl.

guest_stars.character: Beary / Bulk / Old Man Root / Squawk / Creatures (voices)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: My Big Fat Gran Wedding
episodes.overview: To win a bet, Gran decides to marry Mow.

episodes.name: The Strutting Edge
episodes.overview: Ahhh! Valley's kids compete in the Beasty Pageant to see who best poses, calls and struts like an animal.

episodes.name: Can't Hardly Bait
episodes.overview: To graduate with their pals, Thunk and Womp take Squawk's crash course.

episodes.name: Crood Detente
episodes.overview: Without asking the other residents, Grug makes a peace deal with the Broods.

episodes.name: This Is an End
episodes.overview: A fast-approaching asteroid headed toward Ahhh! Valley leads the residents to make hasty moving plans, but Grug insists he can defend their homeland.
